body:
Comment 6 by **kota85**: 
> I hope the current docs at tip.golang.org/doc/install/gccgo are slightly clearer.

They are, thanks.

> The cgo program does work fine with gccgo.

I didn't know--assumed cgo's documentation at http://golang.org/cmd/cgo/ was up to date.
("Cgo does not yet work with gccgo." at the bottom)
